name: WebhookFanoutProject_2025-06-06
observations: Project: Webhook Fanout Service using Cloudflare Workers
Tech Stack: Hono, D1 Database, Drizzle ORM, Next.js Dashboard
Core Purpose: Receive webhooks and fan them out to multiple configured endpoints
Primary Success Criteria: Multi-endpoint fanout with primary response forwarding
Architecture: Serverless worker + Next.js dashboard with optional authentication

name: WorkerDeployment_2025-06-06
observations: description: Deploy and test Cloudflare Worker with D1 database
acceptance_criteria: Worker API functional, database tables created, webhook fanout working
local_context: Fixed static assets conflict, manually created D1 tables, tested multi-endpoint fanout

name: SessionContext_2025-06-06_09-45
observations: task_status: Worker successfully deployed and fully functional
immediate_next: Connect dashboard to deployed worker, fix authentication, add unit tests
modified_files: wrangler.toml (removed assets config), D1 database (tables created)
verified_functionality: Health check, endpoint CRUD, webhook fanout, response forwarding

name: DashboardIntegration_2025-06-06
observations: description: Connect Next.js dashboard to deployed worker API
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard can manage endpoints, view logs, replay webhooks
next_actions: Update API base URL, test dashboard functionality, re-enable auth when compatible
current_focus: Update dashboard API base URL to point to deployed worker
key_outcomes: Dashboard successfully integrated with worker API: endpoints management and logs viewing working

name: UnitTesting_2025-06-06
observations: description: Add comprehensive unit tests for worker and dashboard
acceptance_criteria: All features covered with unit tests

name: Documentation_2025-06-06
observations: description: Add README and usage documentation
acceptance_criteria: Clear setup and usage instructions

name: SessionContext_2025-06-06_10-00

environment: Dashboard running on port 3004, Worker deployed at webhook-fanout-worker.greenrenge.workers.dev

observations: description: Enhance webhook logs display with detailed request/response information

key_outcomes: Added expandable webhook log entries with pretty-printed JSON and formatted headers
